javadoc.text: * Conjugate Gradients solver. CG solves the symmetric positive definite linear * system Ax=b using the Conjugate Gradient method.
javadoc.author: Templates

javadoc.text: * Vectors for use in the iterative solution process
* Constructor for CG. Uses the given vector as template for creating * scratch vectors. Typically, the solution or the right hand side vector * can be passed, and the template is not modified
javadoc.param: templateVector to use as template for the work vectors needed in the * solution process
